columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: APPLIANCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the status for an orthodontics appliance.

columns.name: APPL_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the start date for an orthodontics appliance.

columns.name: EST_DURATION
columns.description: This item stores the estimated duration (in months) for an orthodontics appliance.

columns.name: REMOVAL_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the removal date for an orthodontics appliance.

columns.name: MODIFIED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: History item that tracks every instant an orthodontic appliance has been modified.

columns.name: MODIFIED_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that modified orthodontics appliance data for this history line.

columns.name: MODIFIED_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MODIFIED_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient CSN where data was modified for this history line.

columns.name: WEAR_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the daily wear time for an orthodontics appliance.

columns.name: DENT_APP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the category for this appliance. This category maps to the LSD-98600 table.
